thread.title: Justin Bieber reveals he's 'got no Valentine' in sad video
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber reveals he's 'got no Valentine' in sad video | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Justin Bieber reveals he's 'got no Valentine' in sad video
text:
Justin Bieber cut a lonely figure in video clips he shared via Instagram Stories on Tuesday.
The singer revealed to his fans that he doesn't have a date for Valentine's day.
'All I ever wanted was a Valentine. Now I don’t even have a Valentine!' the 22-year-old said mournfully.
Scroll down for video
Single: Justin Bieber cut a lonely figure in video clips he shared via Instagram Stories on Tuesday. He revealed that he didn't have a date on Valentine's Day
The Biebs even Quote: d a line from the movie Dumb And Dumber.
'I got no food, I got no job, our pet’s heads are falling off and I got no Valentine!' he said.
It's been a solitary few days for the Sorry singer who opted to skip Sunday's Grammy Awards in LA, preferring to head out for sushi instead.
All by myself: 'All I ever wanted was a Valentine. Now I don’t even have a Valentine!' the 22-year-old Canadian pop star said mournfully as he sat in a car
While the leading lights of the music scene were rocking Staples Center, he shared video again on Instagram Stories as he ate his sashimi.
In the clip he was seen wearing spectacles and a mustard yellow-colored hoodie over a white t-shirt.
Meanwhile, his former flame Selena Gomez is in a hot and heavy new romance with rapper The Weeknd,
Justin has also been linked during the past year with Hailey Baldwin and Sofia Richie.
Not celebrating: Justin decided to skip the 59th Annual Grammy Awards in LA in Sunday and opted to go out for sushi instead, sharing it with fans on Instagram Stories
